mapper.select: SELECT B.UPDATED_ID AS updatedId, B.UPDATED_INFO AS updateInfo, B.CREATE_TIME AS createTime FROM UPDATED B ORDER BY B.CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT 0,5

SELECT B.UPDATED_ID AS updatedId, B.UPDATED_INFO AS updateInfo, B.CREATE_TIME AS createTime FROM UPDATED B WHERE B.CREATE_TIME = ( SELECT I.CREATE_TIME FROM( SELECT A.UPDATED_ID,A.UPDATED_INFO,A.CREATE_TIME FROM UPDATED A WHERE A.CREATE_TIME < #{oldDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.CREATE_TIME DESC ) I LIMIT 0,1 ) ORDER BY B.UPDATED_ID ASC
